passives.name: Enduring Focus
passives.effects: After taking damage from a [[champion]], gain '''bonus''' [[health regeneration]] per second equal to {{as|{{rd|0 to 5 for 11|0 to 3.75 for 11|levels=0 to 75|key1=%|formula1=0.066 health regen for every 1% missing health|formula2=0.05 health regen for every 1% missing health|type='''current missing''' health|pp=true}}|health}} for 8 seconds, refreshing on subsequent champion damage taken. [[Area of effect]], [[damage over time]], or [[damage|proc]] damage taken trigger this effect with the {{tip|ranged}} values.

passives.name: Helping Hand
passives.effects: Basic attacks deal {{as|5 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] against [[minions]].

effects_structured.raw: After taking damage from a [[champion]], gain '''bonus''' [[health regeneration]] per second equal to {{as {{rd 0 to 5 for 11 0 to 3.75 for 11 levels=0 to 75 key1=% formula1=0.066 health regen for every 1% missing health formula2=0.05 health regen for every 1% missing health type='''current missing''' health pp=true}} health}} for 8 seconds, refreshing on subsequent champion damage taken
Basic attacks deal {{as 5 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] against [[minions]].

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
context_notes: AoE/DoT/proc damage uses ranged values for the regen effect.
